mapper.select: select notice_seq, notice_title, notice_contents, admin_id, to_char(start_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') start_date, to_char(end_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') end_date from notice
mapper.insert: insert into notice values((select max(notice_seq)+1 from notice), #{notice_title}, #{notice_contents}, #{admin_id} ,to_date(#{start_date},'YY/MM/DD'), to_date(#{end_date},'YY/MM/DD'))
